file_content.text: Hold your fire! We surrender! We surrender!
Please, we're all injured--we aren't even armed! Please, don't hurt us!
Keep your hands where I can see them.
All right, nobody move.
I'll take out every last one of you if I have to, got it?
Blink wrong and you're dead.
I have no mercy for enemies of the Republic.
Shut up.
Please! We're all hurt--bad! We can barely walk!
We won't interfere or try to stop you--I swear it! We'll just... we--we'll walk out the door, and never come back. Just please, let us live!
You can go, as long as you don't cause trouble. Understood?
Very well.
Mercy has a price--so pay up.
What? You mean... but--but look at us, all we have are the clothes on our backs.
Wait, wait! I've got a gold necklace my grandfather gave me. Take it. Please, just let us live!
Here... my wedding ring... don't wanna die....
Hand over the stuff, and you can go.
That will do.
R--really? Uh, all right, here you go.
T--take it... take it....
That's everything we have.
If you're really that bad off, then nevermind--you can go.
Forget it. I won't hurt you.
Really? You mean it? Thank you! Thank you!
You're an honorable soldier. We appreciate it.
I've got to keep moving. Get out of here and don't cause trouble.
All right, I'm leaving.
We won't.
There's a lot more shooting to be done. Keep your heads down and move out.
Stay low and keep safe.
We'll do that. Thanks again.
I will hunt down each and every one of you if you make trouble. Am I clear?
Don't make me regret this.
Y--yes. Totally clear.
This worthless junk isn't going to cut it. Goodbye.
Not good enough. [Attack]
Death to all traitors!
I never leave an enemy alive.
No! Please, no!
Don't hurt us!
You won't see us again, soldier. I swear it.
We'll stay out of your way, trooper. I swear.
